snippet.title: [TAS] NES Wizards & Warriors by Cardboard in 09:35.42
snippet.description:
This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see http://tasvideos.org/956M.html. TAS originally published on 2007-09-10. 

In this game, you're an armor-clad knight with a big sword. You collect gems to bribe a red knight, kill evil beasts and rescue several "distressed damsels". 

This movie, an improvement of 76 seconds over the previous (http://tasvideos.org/166M.html), takes advantage of a glitch that allows you to re-enter the first map and substitute the last few levels with the first levels. There is also a slightly longer movie that does not use this trick (http://tasvideos.org/929M.html).  Do you want to see more adventures of the iron-clad hero of this game, Kuros?
 Read the Knights of the Old Coding (http://kotoc.keenspace.com/) online comic. It's hilarious.  Watch this run being played back on a real console (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tmFtYKwlo4Y).
